lead_paragraph: Tiger Woods's "transgressions" caps a year that included stories of infidelity by Rick Pitino, Steve McNair, the McCourt divorce case and now an N.C.A.A. probe of Tennessee recruiting.
snippet: Tiger Woods's "transgressions" caps a year that included stories of infidelity by Rick Pitino, Steve McNair, the McCourt divorce case and now an N.C.A.A. probe of Tennessee recruiting.
